work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I joined Atlassian's Confluence team and a new grad software engineer eager to tackle frontend development on an awesome product.
notes: Designed and implemented product components for Confluence with a focus on feature development (reactions, comments, onboarding suite) using React and TypeScript.
Authored technical documentation and internal guides for Confluence, enhancing adoption among developers and end-users.

Collaborated with product, data science, and engineering teams on negotiating project scope, analytics, and running A/B tests, iterating based on user feedback to drive feature success and deliver on time.
Created API documentation to support third-party integrations, streamlining collaboration with external partners.
Core product contributions on: collaborative features like reactions and comments, improving the onboarding suite, and running experiments for landing new customers.

work.title: STEM Mentor
work.description: I offered high school students mentorship in their science classes.
notes: I aided in teaching the scientific method, teaching students how to use autocad for 3D printing, and assisting in their experimental process.

work.title: Developer Relations Intern
work.description: Interned a second year on the Angular team to build an ecosystem housing useful tooling and technologies for building Angular apps
notes: Interned with the Angular team (Summer 2018, 2019), contributing to community initiatives and evaluating tools and technologies to enhance the Angular ecosystem.
Created ngEcosystem, a platform connecting developers with community resources, enhancing ecosystem engagement.
Authored a beginner-friendly guide, 'How to build an Angular app with custom components, routing, services, forms, and Angular Material in 6 steps.'

work.title: Developer Relations Intern
work.description: Interned on the Angular team to develop and share tooling, documentation, and guides on migrating from AngularJS to Angular
notes: Developed ngMigration-Assistant, a tool to analyze AngularJS applications, provide migration statistics, and recommend custom migration paths to Angular, addressing key challenges in transitioning from AngularJS to Angular v2+.
Collaborated with major customers to identify migration pain points, guiding the design and implementation of effective solutions.
Presented learnings and tools at local and international conferences, meetups, and through a detailed blog, fostering community engagement and adoption.

work.title: Frontend Engineering Intern
work.description: Learned and built a website for Tappity using JavaScript, HTML, and Bootstrap CSS
notes: Contributed to the development of an interactive educational web app, increasing platform usability and engagement.
